titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the suspension of duties on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/23/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on certain chemicals.
